name: Exorde
description: Exorde is the first dapp to sell e-reputation scores based on data collected by over 10k contributors all over the world, in real-time. Exorde processes over 60M unique URLs per day through a sturdy infrastructure built on SKALE, IPFS and Filecoin, and in so doing, generates more transactions than any other chain daily. Exorde ensures that the data it provides is neutral through a consensus-based mechanism. Moreover all of Exorde's code is transparent, all the transactions are public, and the data it provides is publicly stored on Filecoin.
